mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( MOVIE_ID, USER_SEQ, CONTENT, REG_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{movie_id}, #{user_seq}, #{content}, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_SEQ AS review_seq, USER_SEQ AS user_seq, MOVIE_ID AS movie_id, CONTENT AS content, REG_DT AS reg_dt, REG_ID AS reg_id FROM REVIEW WHERE MOVIE_ID = #{mid} ORDER BY REVIEW_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENT = #{content}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE(), WHERE REVIEW_SEQ =#{review_seq}
